first_aid: If inhaled, move to fresh air. If on skin, wash with water.
fire_fighting: Use alcohol-resistant foam, CO2, dry chemical.
spill_response: Absorb with inert material, ventilate area.
handling_storage: Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames. Store tightly closed.
exposure_controls: Provide adequate ventilation; wear protective gloves and goggles.
toxicology: May cause eye irritation; high vapor concentrations may cause drowsiness.
ecology: Volatile; avoid release to the environment.
disposal: Dispose of contents/container in accordance with local regulations.
